website_summaries.verdict: While not technically a dog-specific camera, it works well for the purpose and is an affordable option.
pros: This low-priced camera offers great picture quality, is easy to set up, and can be placed out of reach of pets
Users can enjoy clear 2-way communication and the versatile little camera can be used as a home security camera since it allows for motion tracking
Camera angle can be moved around remotely
cons: No treat dispenser since it's not dog-specific and the app sometimes lags

website_summaries.verdict: Loaded with some unique features at a reasonable price.
pros: Motion detection, 360-degree movement, and bookmarking of favorite positions are a few of the features that add convenience and usability
cons: There have been problems with updating the firmware and connectivity

website_summaries.verdict: Clearly records visuals and sound with the ability to save each file.
pros: A quality bot that is also mindful of your privacy
Customers note this product is plug and play, and operates almost immediately
Tracks motion for up to a week
cons: Could pair better with applications such as Alexa

customer_reviews.title: HACKED IN NO TIME
customer_reviews.text: Nice overall design, and setup didn't take long. Picture quality is fair, having auto , SD , and HD settings THAT CAN BE set from your phone. Although, 30 minutes AFTER INSTALLING, IT WAS HACKED, THE PERPETRATOR LEFT HIS BLURRY CALLING CARD ,A PHOTO OF HIS "Crew " a website , and a picture of me in my night clothes. The website contained a conversation between his mentor and himself, describing my camera, giving details such as my camera's IP address. Security? NO. If you want to spy on someone.... As I say, if it can be built, it WILL BE HACKED.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: False Sense of Privacy
customer_reviews.text: The app that you need to use this can only be downloaded if you change the country to China on your App Store. In addition, the app requires you to agree to an absurd set of privacy violations. By agreeing to the apps terms and conditions, you are allowing your data to be mined on the back end with a false sense of security on the front end. Pay close attention to the fine print with this. As for me, I will be returning this camera right away. DONT BOTHER WITH THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Will not pair
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this camera with all of the reviews. But ,unfortunately, as other reviewer's have stated, it will not pair. I have been working on it for approximately two hours . I have reset the camera multiple times, I have reinstalled the app multiple times, I did the firmware update (which was not easy) but it will not connect to Wi-Fi. It gets to the very last step where the camera needs to pair with my phone, and it won't do it. I purchased this a few months ago, and finally setting it up. I will be emailing Amazon for a refund. Apparently, after research, this is a common issue for many.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Sold as having "7-days activity alert video storage in YI ...
customer_reviews.text: Sold as having "7-days activity alert video storage in YI cloud free of charge" Nope. You get a one month trial, then they start charging you. Sold as PTZ (Pan/Tilt/Zoom). Nope. The zoom is just "digital" zoom. In other words, no zoom at all, just a way of making a part of the picture larger with a corresponding decrease in resolution. You can do that just by playing the video on a larger screen.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing camera! I bought this originally to keep an eye on my fiancé's apartment while we stayed in a hotel as part of a staycation and it was awesome. I loved it so much I bought one for myself to watch my dog and got my mum one too! 😁 amazing clarity and love the fact it can be controlled from your phone. To be able to keep a record of your recordings you need to be subscribed to the cloud service.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Since 12/6/2017 their iOS app Yi Home was not available ...
customer_reviews.text: Since 12/6/2017 their iOS app Yi Home was not available for download on the Apple App Store. For some reason Apple has pulled their app from the store (I'm guessing security reasons). Even if they did fix this issue, not going to risk same thing happening again. Will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kang

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one until YI fixes the software problems.
customer_reviews.text: I have a YI action camera and I love it. So, I thought that I would try out their home security camera. The set up is easy. The camera talks to you through the process. The camera however will not connect to my wifi router. I have tried everything, and like the others that have reviewed this I cannot get it to work. Pass on the YI home cameras until they get the software fixed. I will be returning the camera. I do recommend their action cameras.
customer_reviews.author: DG2017

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a video montitor for our baby and loved it so much that we purchased more for our other kids room! I was a little skeptical but it is MORE THAT WE EXPECTED! Awesome product!!! The picture quality, sound and recording is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia R

customer_reviews.title: Absolute trash
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge gadget guy, and I could not get this running. Maybe this was defective but the fact that it did not work out of the box is sad. It never saw the QR code I held in front of it for an eternity. Tried different screen brightness, even printed off the QR but nothing. I triple checked the wifi credentials and tried to do a manual firmware update but the file it downloaded wasn't even a .zip or .bin file so I don't know if it was a mistake on the website. I renamed the file and put it on a fat32 sd card anyway. Sending this back and the search continues for a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hanger

customer_reviews.title: Great security camera until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: 02/11/18 Update - After less than a year, it has stopped working. It said it was offline so I tried to refresh it. Nothing. I unplugged it for a while, plugged it back in and refreshed it. Nothing. I scanned the QR code to reset it up but it won't do it. I've hit the reset button several times. Nothing. The yellow light comes on and flashes, then the blue light comes on and flashes, then the camera rotates to one side and the motor just keeps grinding. While it worked it was a great camera. But don't buy one unless you plan on replacing it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Useless w/o App (App Unavailable in US)
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing the details of this camera and the customer images I was excited to get it camera for what seemed like a great price. As soon as the camera came I found the right spot, got it mounted and plugged in, and went to download the app. As suggested in the instructions I searched for "Yi Home" to no results. So, instead I scanned the QR code in the instructions and got back a message saying "App unavailable in US". I have plenty of things to use as paperweights already, so this is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Quit working!
customer_reviews.text: This product WAS working great, but I just got a new iphone 7 and now it won't work!! I transferred all my old apps, etc from my old iphone 5 onto the new iphone 7 from the cloud and when I try to reset and connect to the camera in the YI home app it says "Failed to generate QR code, Try moving cell phone closer to WiFi router," I was standing right next to the router. This comes up after I enter my wifi password, and I have done everything correctly. Please tell me I didn't waste $60 on this to have it already not working?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: found it but found no instructions so I gave up and made decision not to waste more time on this
customer_reviews.text: I spent 1 hour trying to connect this using the app and every time no result ( I did everything correct and I am an IT engineer) then as per their suggestion I tried to upgrade firmware, found it but found no instructions so I gave up and made decision not to waste more time on this, needless to say that all the time the damn camera were shouting "waiting to connect" and made me crazy, such an unprofessional product.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: doesn't stay connected. nothing on their website to troubleshoot ...
customer_reviews.text: original post: doesn't stay connected ... and i am not a technical novice. nothing on their website to troubleshoot. nothing in the forums to troubleshoot. tried emailing them for support but still waiting on a response ... and it will probably take more than on response. spend twice the money for something that actually works and may include troubleshooting. i regret the purchase of this camera that will probably end up in the trash. updated post: a different app suddenly became available and it now connects and stays connected. would have been helpful if their tech support would have mentioned this solution. now it's great!
customer_reviews.author: buckeyepetey

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but good resource.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been a life saver. We use it to keep watching on our dog. The motion detention only follows something if it is moving slow enough at a distance away from the camera. If you go near it and walk past at a decent pace it won't follow your movement. That being said it usually will alert you and you can manully move the camera to see what's going on. There's no monthly fees, just the cost of the camera and you can check it from anywhere on your phone. You can talk through the camera as well, which my husband uses when I'm home and I don't hear my phone ring.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ritschard

customer_reviews.title: good starter
customer_reviews.text: couldn't be simpler installing and setting up. This is a robust camera if you're looking to just do a basic surveillance of property/room. I wouldn't recommend purchasing it, however, as it is fraught with limitations (only available by creating a mobile account) and bugs (goes offline on its own). PROS: Simple design, good 720p quality, near weatherproof design SD storage or cloud subscription. Affordable CONS: mobile app crashes (needing the cache wiped to remedy), no PC GUI, camera routinely goes offline and loses your network (despite strong signal strength) and requires you to physically reset the camera by flashing an aztec barcode to rejoin.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: China is the the Saudi Arabia of data.
customer_reviews.text: Only concern I have is that I am probably giving the Chinese government all my information. But I'm more concerned with my neighbors than the Chinese, and for the price, it's worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Security Camera!  Reliable company.
customer_reviews.text: Time has proven this product to be excellent. The company constantly strives to both improve and develop their products, and over the last two years of having these cameras I have received good tech support. These are sturdy cameras. After initially using wifi to link to cell or computer app, I usually switch the real time feed over to cell data. Cloud storage is offered, and works well. Can be used manually without signal to record.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Thousands of times listen "wifi password error", change the ...
customer_reviews.text: Thousands of times listen "wifi password error", change the password, check all other details, and the camera does not connect. What a nightmare. Dont buy this product, I have 2 months trying with costumer service and they dont know how to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Constantino

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend this camera to anyone with current level of customer ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted them to work badly but the app doesn't pair the camera. Camera is able to connect to wifi ( it says wifi connected through its speakers once it does) but the app fails to pair it. I have contacted Yi customer care but they did not even reply. I will wait for few more days and see if someone responds to this review and if no one cares, I am returning the item to Amazon. Will not recommend this camera to anyone with current level of customer service.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had better recording capability.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to watch our dog during the day as he was having some separation anxiety. Cool that you can hear and talk through it. Not great quality, but enough to get the message across. Wanted to record our dog as we left, but found out you have to have to be watching the camera and have it open in the app in order to record. It also stopped recording as we left the house and transitioned from Wifi to cellular service. Good for general check-ins on your house, but do not think this would be good as security.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Zieglmeier

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for security.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, turned on the motion detection and it follows any movement. I'm using this to keep an eye on the vehicles in my driveway & parked along the curb. I have 2 of my grown children still living with me. I turned the IR lights off so they wouldn't reflect off the glass. With 2 street lights there's no need for the IR lights. I set bookmarks so it always returns after tracking someone/something. I have 2 YI cameras in my house for security when I'm out. Setup was super easy. Price was right too. I can use the app to check up on my house any time, any where.
customer_reviews.author: GUNMAN1947

customer_reviews.title: Rotates and clicks once an hour or so. Dumb ads.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. Except the dumb placement of ads in the app. The camera also turns full left on its own about once an hour, then makes a clicking noise, like gears skipping, then returns forward. Is it supposed to do this? I think I will return it and get something else. The adds pop up as soon as you open the app, so if you need to open the app in a rush to see what the camera sees, well you have to wait for the app to load then close it, then open the camera view. It is a really dumb thing to do to a security camera.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy, Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th Yi camera. First dome. Works great. Great visual quality and fantastic sound. I love the desktop app to watch house while I’m at work. Alerts my phone when I’ve logged in on desktop to keep me informed. App used to be great-5 stars!!! Lately there have been a few instances where there are server connection issues at Yi-not in your home. The app will display that message, and sometimes they will update Twitter to an outage, but not always. It would be nice if they had more information about outages-eta of fix, why, etc...but still love love love Yi.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Company's Quality control very bad.
customer_reviews.text: They sent me a defective unit from the get go. Product powered up, connected to the WiFi easily but would not connect to app. Only thing I can figure out is that they sent me the wrong country's hardware. It did have US in the product # which it talks about on it's web sight but it acts like they sent me Chinese internal hardware in a US bound model. I'm at a 75% failure rate with these cameras. 2 HD Domes, and 2 760 Domes. I have 1 working 760 Dome left working. Buyer beware. It is a crap shot if you get a working one or not.
customer_reviews.author: Slappy75

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it negative 5 stars I would. The camera came broken and does not properly swivel.. when I tried to set it up I got connection error a half dozen times. I reached out to technical support and they will not help you with your product. They want you to email back and forth day after day but when discussing a technical error emailing is nearly impossible. It needs to be in real time so they can walk you through it,not wait a day for step by steps. This takes days and days All I kept getting is a message saying is there anything else we can help you with. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Worked out of the box. Fascinating technology at a lean price. Could use a PDF manual. Thought it was defective on the first day, until I slept on it. Works like a charm. Con: Charger was faulty from unboxing. USB cable insufficient. Result: I will monitor the situation and make a determination. If all works, then I will be purchasing them in small bulk quantities. Summary: Best test so far. I love it, providing that it has endurance. Update 4/20/2018 I received a replacement charger and cord promptly from Erik and it works perfectly. The product is working fantastically and customer service is top notch. I'm buying 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Solrgroovy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera. Does everything it says it will do. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the price for the quality of this camera. The app and push notifications are awesome. The camera actually talks to you when setting it up. The camera scans a qr code from the screen of your phone in the app to get all of the wireless network information for setting it up. I can actually talk to whoever is in the room from my phone and they can talk back to me. If I had any complaint it would be that it does not integrate with Samsung Smartthings Hub/App. Of course everything else is awesome. For the $39.00 I paid for it I can't believe it actually functions like it says it will. 6 stars
customer_reviews.author: Norman Winkel

customer_reviews.title: Working flawlessly with easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and setup. Was able to invite others to use my camera with ease. Came with screws to mount it on the ceiling. The base of the device is heavy enough and the construction is such that it doesn't feel cheap. The app has great features and is well laid out. Would be great if I could invite people that don't have a yi account, they would receive an email with instructions and they would then be able to set up an account and automatically have access. I am very satisfied with the camera so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for watching dogs and sketchy roommates
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this camera. I use it to watch my dogs while I'm not home and also to make sure my psycho roommate doesn't steal my stuff. Picture quality is pretty good for a $30 camera, night vision is too. I'm not familiar with the privacy issues that other reviewers are writing about, nor do I really care because I use it to watch my dogs and half my neighborhood has seen me changing through the windows, so what's a creepy hacker? The governments watching us all anyways  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Great find for amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Friends had this and we a asked them first, before buying... We LOVE this camera! It can be turned off and on from your phone, has a two way speaker, its great. Occasionally we have issues connecting to it, it also goes black and white at times, and sound cuts out (but its also powered by internet and even with the best, it always has its days) but we also are still working out the bugs, its still very new. I am super pleased to have it! Has great range of motion, great sound quality too.The cord is long, wish it was just a little longer😊
customer_reviews.author: Trisha C.

customer_reviews.title: ... day trying to get this to work with really crappy fairly nonexistant instructions
customer_reviews.text: After spending an agonizing day trying to get this to work with really crappy fairly nonexistant instructions, turns out one needs a computer with WI-FI on it or it doesn't work. You also have to have a certain level Apple I-phone. Also no where does it say that it needs a micro SD Card. Seller should clearly list all the REQUIREMENTS necessary for their product to operate (all the things you have to buy separately). I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC night vision!!! Even without IR turned on
customer_reviews.text: This camera has AMAZING low-light abilities... even with night vision mode turned on it works EXTREMELY well. Now this review is for "YI Dome Camera Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wireless IP Indoor Security Surveillance System 720p HD Night Vision" in case this ends up in one of those annoying 'review piles' which covers ALL versions of their product. This is an issue since I also bought (more recently) one of their 'fixed' cameras and its night performance sucks without the IR turned on (fine with IR but it clicks when it changes modes which make you wonder how long until THAT breaks). But this camera was surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.author: Ann P

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolute horse pile! Can’t get it to work, thanks to the fact it is not on Apple App Store. Neither there is PC support to activate it. I suspect there is some scamming and data mining going on as well. I would not trust this with your security, returning right away!
customer_reviews.author: Vice9

customer_reviews.title: It does the JOB!
customer_reviews.text: Upon purchasing this product, I was skeptical about the privacy protection issues that I read in previous comments. Within a week, I fell in love with the camera. It made my life so much better! I mainly got it for my new puppy! It has dropped a few times and has scratches, but its fully functioning, and the app makes it easy to control. About a week ago I purchased a second camera, and love it just a much! Camera and audio quality are great during day and night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews unless something truly impresses me. This camera definitely impresses me! We use this camera in my grandson's bedroom. I can check on him no matter what time of day or night, from anywhere! I work in a very busy ER and can look on the app to see him sleeping, or see him playing in his room. I love the talk feature....if he wakes up in the middle of the night and calls for me or his mom, I can tell him "It's too early to get up, honey, lay down and go nite-nite." And he does! Works wonderfully and is very inexpensive. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Faulty App so can’t use product
customer_reviews.text: Was unable to use at all since I was unable to create an account. Their app is faulty and doesn’t show a security code in the box that is required to create an account. I tried several times to get a new code to appear but the box was always blank. Since I didn’t try it right away and the return is only 30days I have to return it. No tech support on weekends. I have to reason to believe the issue with the app will resolve so its going in the mail tomorrow. Additionally, the website does not allow logging in or creating an account so I couldn’t even do that.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle0012

customer_reviews.title: quality of picture and ease of use is good
customer_reviews.text: the product has worked well--ie...I get alerts into my cell phone..but occasionally, someone visits my home and the "event" is not recorded...therefore the "motion" did not trigger an event. I believe that this unit is SENSITIVE ENOUGH but believe that it is programmed to pick up 'events" during intervals --random movements will trigger an alert-but only when the time is consistent with the time in which the alerts are captured--ie...not every event is captured.
customer_reviews.author: down by the sea

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this. Ineffective and outdated
customer_reviews.text: Product was ineffective at best but customer service is non existent. Prepare to wait on hold during open hours for 10 minutes only to get a recording that says they will call you back when they are available, which they don’t. And they do not return phone calls. Motion control option on app stopped working. Had to reset camera which ultimately failed after multiple attempts and zero support options. Their troubleshooting Tips are like an endless loop. Save your $ and buy from a company that has actual Support. Left two voicemails and sent two emails with no response.
customer_reviews.author: darla carter

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, not great, and not for remote use
customer_reviews.text: We bought these cameras to use at our cabin and found that if/when the power ever goes out, they have trouble reconnecting to the wifi. Even when other devices come back on-line just fine, such as the thermostat, and the weather station monitoring, these cameras will often take days, or even require a hard reset before they will reconnect. Very disappointing. If you buy for use in an always occupied place, I think they are good for the money. I do have concerns about the security and privacy, but for our application, that was not as big a deal.
customer_reviews.author: myPenName@Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Works but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was looking for. The picture quality is perfect. But the only way I could see what I wanted to see was to have the camera mounted upside down under something. I purchased this camera so that it can stand on a coffee table mounting it on something was not possible. Also it was very visible and stood out in the decor with the white casing and the black ball Dome. If you want to use this as a security camera it is very visible and there's nothing to stop the robber from either taking the camera or the SD card. The speaker was not clear and it echoed a lot.
customer_reviews.author: larissa

customer_reviews.title: Works great, when it works
customer_reviews.text: Works great, when it works. Took me a few nights to get this to function properly. Once I figured it out it has been working great. Night vision looks great, and doesn't glare through the window. I'll be waiting to see how long this last, or if the SD card provides a problem again. In case anyone has an issue, what worked for me was: Power down camera Remove SD card Format to FAT32 Insert back into camera Power camera on Format it through the mobile app After doing that I let it sit for 12-16hours without messing with anything. I was able to review footage and everything has been working since.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Beware subscription fee
customer_reviews.text: It was a great little camera, but beware you have to pay $130 yearly subsctiption for it to work. This is not mentioned in the description!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to spy on my dog and it’s my favorite. It tracks his motion so I can see more of what he is doing, it’s easy to use and set up. I’ve had it for 2 years and the only downside is I no longer get push notifications for motion alerts which is an app no camera thing. Camera still tracks it. I turn it off/unplug when I’m home mainly because cameras freak me out and it takes mere seconds to boot back up. It has started to make a noise when rotating, but I’ve also had it for 2 years. I will definitely buy another if/when needed
customer_reviews.author: Pickyshoer

customer_reviews.title: Must connect only to their subscription cloud service or phone app via WIFI to view recordings.
customer_reviews.text: My first impression with this camera was very good, the setup was easy and very configurable. The reason for only 3 stars is this unit cannot be viewed from the internet without subscribing to their cloud service. The device will not connect to anything but their app for either Android or IOS. My intention was to set up a recording PC for easy access to the camera and recordings, this cannot be done. Without the proprietary cloud subscription service the only way to view all recordings is to turn the device off, pull the memory card (not included) and read that from a PC.
customer_reviews.author: Danny L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Most easiest to setup ip camera I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream. Wish it had a few more options like more control over sensitivity and masking off areas so it would not trigger motion detection. Also does not seem to work with Blue Iris software. Still very easy to use and well worth the low price. Video quality is very good but the ability to talk via the camera is awesome! The design of software is brilliant as well. Very easy to use, although not nearly as many options as the Amcrest camera which cost about $30 more. But definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great camera,  but kills wifi on my router...  so not using anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I had this camera setup for unattended viewing using a little ATT prepaid hotspot and it worked great. I watched Hurricane Michael on it and it worked like a champ. Now I've been trying to set it up to use on a 'real' router with my in house network... and every time I get to the point where it tries to log in... it brings down the 2.4ghz network on my router. I have to reboot the router to get it back. The camera reports 'password error' and then the whole network disappears. So its pretty much useless on my hardware now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ridenhour

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, good quality, worried about its behavior
customer_reviews.text: Got a few of these cameras and the quality is great, the price is great, however I am worried we are being watched at times. The camera will pan and tilt randomly. I understand it has motion detection and it follows the motion, however sometimes the camera will rotate completely to its end and sit there trying to keep rotating and then turn all the way back around like someone else is moving it. Also with motion tracking turned off, the cameras still track motion which is annoying. I opened a ticket with support and they did reply quickly however they simply told me to "turn off motion tracking". Why didn't I think of that!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Returned but Buying Again!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because it was broken out of the box but the pictures it took and relayed to my phone were very good. It hooked up quick and easily. The results were not grainy at all and the sound was great. The night vision worked great too. I will be rebuying this product. The problem with mine wa the neck was stuck and would not fully turn, I do not feel it is representative of the quality of this camera and look forward to my new one.
customer_reviews.author: ByEqualMeasure - julie

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome, buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, buy it now! I have bought multiple security cams and systems and just wanted something for my twins room because they always argue at bedtime. Then we went on vacation and I used it in the living room, they I wanted on in all the important rooms... it not spying its more checking in on things, the cats, the kids, are the lights off/on... motion detected when no one should be in a room, you can get a test message. I bough more of the YI's and the app is so great wish I had gotten these for my office if there existed 3 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Kpaxnyc1

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, excellent features!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the camera for about a week now and I am very happy with it. The features on the camera are amazing given the very reasonable price. Very easy to setup. Very good picture quality. Great viewable camera coverage. I like how you record onto an SD card. The phone app is extremely handy and easy to use. I would highly recommend this camera. I have a couple friends already buying a YI camera based on how much I like mine.
customer_reviews.author: ElectricNomad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to keep an eye on my dogs but it has come in handy in so many ways! The night vision and audio quality are a lot better than expected. I love that I can get alerts to my phone if motion is detected and can pull it up immediately to see what is going on in my house. We also set it up by the door to see when our daughter gets home from school and if she has any friends over or is actually doing her homework lol. It has every function we need and then some...for an unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Farris

customer_reviews.title: Good on a budget
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and concept of these cameras, even the yearly cloud package. We have just had a hard time with them working to record consistantly. We purchased 2, and had to replace 1 once and the other twice. Good for the price if on budget, but we are now saving up for the higher quality cameras. We still run both and it haz been better, cuztomer service has been good.
customer_reviews.author: JDye

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The camera is extremely slow when I try to turn it and it loses connection sometimes. I put it on the kitchen counter but it can’t tilt down low enough to see my puppy on the floor where his play area is. I ended up just turning it off because I got frustrated. considering just returning it rather than turning it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Hea Hea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to monitor my bedroom during my absence, as wasn't quite sure about my pet sitter and that's where I keep my valuables. Did the job I needed it to do. 360 degree coverage, good audio and pretty clear picture! I also have one in my living room to keep an eye on my dog and cat during the day when I'm at work. I would recommend if you need some surveillance in your home without a lot of expense. Great app and am able to watch my house and can even talk to my pets during the day! Good product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Some things to ponder before deciding on this camera.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was impressed with the quality and features for the price. However, after only a short time of having it, the micro sd card has become corrupt. I have tried to reformat it, but it continues to say "abnormality detected' or it will not even recognize one as there. Now this could be the card, the camera, or a combination of both. Just thought I'd let potential buyers know. If it is true that the micro sd card goes bad so quickly, then recording capabilities of this camera begin to become expensive, and other options may be considered. However, for the price, it still provides great image quality, Wi-fi connectivity, etc... Just some things to ponder.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Now you also have to pay to subscribe
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera since summer and used to love it! However, they recently updated the app and now you have to pay a subscription fee in order to see the alerts the camera records. Now unless I want to pay, it's no more than a decoration. It still tells me there are alerts throughout the night that I need to check, but won't show them to me!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not realiable nor durable!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to monitor my granddaughter sleeping in her crib. I used it 6-8 time and the camera failed. I called YI customer support and they took me through trouble shooting steps. Their suggestions were all things that I had alreay tried. They acknowledged that it was the camera, but would do anything to remedy the problem. I basically have a $34 paper weight. BEWARE!! This camera literally sat on the dresser affixed with velcro and never moved. Very disappointed with the camera and the customer service. There are many other options. I would not rcommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sd card problems
customer_reviews.text: I have this 3 months. At first I was so happy with it, would have given 5 stars, but now I cant get the sd card to work. The one I bought new with it was fine for maybe 7 weeks, but then somehow is not detected anymore. I keep resetting the card, power off/on, reformat the card, try another card... always not detected. So I am sad. I see a lot of other users have this same issue, I hope maybe a firmware update can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.H.

customer_reviews.title: So far, it works well for this first time wi-fi camera user.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and it is providing a clear view of the vestibule of an apartment building I own in which package theft has been a problem. I get alerts on my phone every time someone enters or leave the building. A problem is that I also get alerts when a shadow from passing street traffic goes by the building. With permission, I have it hooked up to one of the tenant's wi-fi networks. Before I can view the alters, I do get an annoying screen promoting YI's cloud service. This is my first experience with a remote wi-fi camera, and, given the low cost and the ease of set up and use. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: alanmgunn

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've bought
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for a couple of weeks now and it works great. Set up was simple. The camera itself talked me through it. I had it set up in 5 minutes. I've had no problems with it disconnecting from WiFi. The app works great. I have it mounted in a living room window so I can see the whole front yard and the living room. I can move the camera from anywhere with the app. It also sees really well at night. Very clear. Much better than the cameras I have outside. I plan on buying 2 more. Great product and price. So glad I bought 1. I just about didn't because of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: the reason i gave it 2 stars is you have to buy cloud space
customer_reviews.text: it worked okay, took a long time to get the wifi to work, also the base is big and bulky and did not fit in the space that I needed it for. But having to be stuck with the tiny memory chip or pay for cloud space, no thank you. they need to have a free upload to computer and/or option to just watch the video via wifi and not need to use any storage (dont record unless you choose to) maybe it does but instructions were garbage as well. They need to stop having China or India write the instruction manuals for products.
customer_reviews.author: kevin k.

customer_reviews.title: Short lived purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this March of 2018 and now it is September of 2019 and the camera does not work. It constantly travels to the end of its rotation and gets stuck there. Pressing the reset button does nothing. Can no longer contact the camera with my phone. I should have been skeptical of this purchase because the setup was pretty ridiculous and contact with my wireless system took at least one hour of repeated attempts. Useless. Do not but this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Gottsacker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Cameras!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 4 of these and bought 2 for my mothers place. They are very easy to set up and use. The picture quality is great too. These do say indoor but ive had 2 of my other ones mounted outside for over a year without any issues. They are mounted under the eve of my house so they don't get rained or snowed on but they work perfect. The app is very easy to use and has great features. Ive had many cameras in the past and I find these to be a great price and easy to use. They have play back feature, motion detection and can also set your own cruz route. Highly recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven & Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheap Cam to Spy on our Dog
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money. The picture quality is great. The ability to move the cam and have a two-way speaking capability makes the price a steal. We're happy with our purchase and we have found out how our dog was getting out of the gated section of the hallway. She is quite the jumper! Thing allows us to talk her out of it before it happens. She's smart, so after hearing our voices and not seeing us, she jumps the gate, to go look for us, gets on the sofa, peaks out the window, and then sleeps on the sofa until we get home. We have some more training to do, but this camera was a huge help.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Good rating
customer_reviews.text: I give this 3 stars because when connecting the camera, you have to be standing right by your wireless router for it to link. Considering it must be plugged in while you do this it causes an issue if you're putting the camera in another room. Not to impressed with the connection. Over all- the camera is phenomenal. The night time vision, day time picture is great and easy to use. I can hear and speak to my dog when he is doing something he isn't supposed to be doing.
customer_reviews.author: Allana

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: We were not very satisfied with our product once we started using it. The set up is not simple, and it doesn't give much explanation or information on storage - such as SD cards. There's a slot for one but doesn't go into detail. It lags very very badly and I am only able to turn it on and off if I'm in my apartment connected to the wifi. It gets stuck all the time when swiveling. It's supposed to detect noise too but it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Coon

customer_reviews.title: Subscription required?
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it must be required to have a subscription. I just want a camera I don't necessarily need it save to some cloud and I don't want to pay for an additional subscription just doesn't fit my purpose. There's another camera that is just a little bit more that does not require all that that I have purchased for my son and it doesn't have a subscription. Definitely sending this back and ordering the one I had sent him. What a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Marshall

customer_reviews.title: SD Card Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Things worked OK and it all seemed fun until adding an SD card. After reseting, reinstalling, etc. the best I get is "Fail to load video." I'm using mine on the latest iOS with the latest YI device firmware. If you use a VPN, the app won't connect to your camera. As others have said, there are serious potential security threats, but I haven't looked into it deeply. Bottom line is SD card won't work and I'm not archiving my video willingly on their server.
customer_reviews.author: Pine Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Just a expensive toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought three domes. The manufacture of the cameras are acceptable. The quality of the image (even in 1080) is poor. The speed of response to the movement controls, irregular. The fluidity of the video is choppy at all times (I have 120 Mbps of internet and each camera is close to a Google WIFI). Bad sound quality (distorted, with a lot of background noise). The worst of all is the app (at least the one for IOS), review the recordings is inaccurate, difficult and tedious (especially in IOS). The general idea of ​​the system is interesting ... But not works! It is not reliable or pleasant to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Vasquez Flores

customer_reviews.title: I’m obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Poorly packaged in an envelope so on arrival the box was destroyed. Fortunately, it was all good from there. Nothing broken. So simple to set up. Very user friendly with an easy to use application for my iPhone. Great image quality and the camera movement is surprisingly smooth. I also get to tell my dog to get off the couch from my office at work now so win, win. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J_B_Cran

customer_reviews.title: Motion Tracking and reviewing video barely works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a baby monitor and wanted to occasionally see how my kid was doing with the babysitter. I have the motion tracking on "high" but some cameras don't have any alerts for the day. Then, reviewing the video is annoying and sometimes it says the Wifi has a poor network connection (our house really isn't that large). So I pop out the micro SD card (mind you, this is incredibly inconvenient if the camera is mounted on the ceiling) to review the footage on my computer - and it's not readable by the computer. Updating my review, 2 years later, the up down function on my camera is broken. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Has a few annoying quirks
customer_reviews.text: Used in our kids' bedrooms. We didn't want to spend $100-$150 for 2 cameras, so we settled on this. Very happy with our purchase. Pros: - It can track movement across the room (you can deactivate). - Night vision works very well. - The 2-way intercom feature. - Alerts on your phone whenever there is movement in the room. Cons: - The app often has a 3 second advertisement enticing you to upgrade to the cloud. - The alerts are a little delayed (sometimes our toddler has already left the room before alerted) - Alerts tell you there's movement on camera (serial #), not in the camera you renamed it
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: A Good product for this price range.
customer_reviews.text: I got this cam a couple of weeks ago, and I am impressed. I got the 720p Long story short: PROS. Setting up is EASY. Material quality is good for this price range. Image/sound/other available features are also good for this price range. I have not used every single option/feature available, but nothing seems hard to set up or do in this camera. CONS. A little slow as far as two way conversation, words take about a second "to arrive" so you have to talk paused; maybe wifi related maybe not. All in all, to me, this thing is a good product, again, for this price range. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Cool until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: This worked well initially, but after about a month something happened with the picture quality and the colors were warped and there was a lot of weird static - couldn’t see anything. I also had issues with controlling the rotation of the camera and it would get stuck in one place (usually the wrong place). There are also a ton of security concerns, but other reviewers cover those more in depth. Basically I learned my lesson about cheaping out on a security camera. It’s a total waste of money and I’m going to buy a trusted name-brand one instead.
customer_reviews.author: SRG

customer_reviews.title: You're being watched!!!! Freaked out!
customer_reviews.text: I am not very tech savvy but I do know, when you turn the cameras off, they should stay off! Mine magically turn itself off and on by itself. Also, why would I get alerts saying "motion detected", if I turned that off in my settings and turned the cameras off?!!!! Super freaked out! Also, when it shows a clip that was recorded, when you press on it, it gives you a live feed! Then it toggles quickly back and forth like the camera is having a seizure! How do you know you were hacked and that someone is watching you? I'm disconnecting the cameras ASAP and hope to get a refund. I've only had these barely 2 months!
customer_reviews.author: JLynn

customer_reviews.title: Best camera and Vonpany to deal with!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third YI camera purchase and I can tell you that their software is very easy to connect and the camera is nice looking one. With this product I was having problem with a magenta color casting. I contacted the company's help desk to guide me to the process to remove the magenta color cast. After many attempts on my part to reset the camera the magenta color casting was still there. The company went above and beyond and sent me another YI camera at not cost to me. This company is very easy to deal with. I will buy again. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking. YI by.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend to get this camera. This camera has quite of regular errors. I contacted support and they ask me to do a bunch of stupid things. I did follow their instructions, but nothing changed. Motion detection works at times. Motion tracking doesn’t follow the moving objects. Looses network connection constantly. Constantly goes all the way to one direction and stays there while making motor sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: WATCHING HOUSE AND DOG
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s suppose to......keeps an eye and an ear on my vacation house. Bought two (both on same iPhone and shared iPhone with spouse) so it does the same for my primary home when we’re at my vacation house. Also...adopted a dog. Now we watch her when we’re gone. A VERY minor negative..the tracking system is a little slow and loses our dog when she moves around too fast. But for us, that’s not an important feature.
customer_reviews.author: OSU Fan

customer_reviews.title: Loud Clicking Wakes Baby
customer_reviews.text: Generally a good camera, but not a good baby monitor for one reason: during my baby's nap, the camera will not be able to decide between night vision and day vision. It will loudly click between each back and forth until it wakes up the baby. Turning off the automatic switching between night and day vision is not possible (while there is an option to turn of the IR Light, that does not seem to have any effect). Unfortunately, this makes the camera useless to us.
customer_reviews.author: ipr151

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless cam with easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wireless cam for several months and it's so easy to use. I had purchased a HooToo that worked for about 2 years and then when we moved, it wouldn't reconfigure. I'm not an expert but I'm pretty tech savvy along with my InfoTech hubby, you would think that it wouldn't be an issue, but we never could get it back on our wireless network. But this wireless cam was simply, plug and play. I've moved it several times and it automatically reconnects to the network without difficulty. I think it's a bit pricey but I think you get what you pay for and this camera is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Functional and reliable camera for easy check-ins
customer_reviews.text: This item works exactly as intended. I have zero complaints, especially for the price. It doesn't give you indications if there is movement, but that's not what it's designed for. It's designed as a simple camera that you can open up on your phone and check on your dog/kid/house/etc. Setting it up was super simple, and the app works without issue. The only downside is the cord is slightly too short for my tall ceilings. I purchased this to check in on my dog throughout the work day. I enjoy the ability to speak through the camera/app, but my dog just ignores my disembodied voice already haha.
customer_reviews.author: Laynie

customer_reviews.title: Great dog sitter!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera! It was really easy to setup. I have it mounted on the ceiling with command strips😂. The tracking is great and I love that I can go in and move the camera around and if need be I can talk to whomever is in the room. Right now I am using it to watch my dog that we just adopted. She doesn't like to be alone and is acting out. The camera helps to catch her in the act with motion aletrts and the ability to talk to her is great. She on the other hand is confused as heck 😂😂
customer_reviews.author: c. hogue

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all, does not want link to my phone. Also web sight says it’s 19.99 per quarter To backup your video. Tell you say your iso ie I phone and then it’s $25.99 a month. Total rippoff . There’s way cheaper options out there then this with amazon backup
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Quick

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6 Months. Warranty worked great.
customer_reviews.text: You MUST have a strong Wi-Fi signal or the camera will not connect. Once connected it worked fine for 6 months and then died. I am currently in the process of returning for warranty repair or replace. Update: After two weeks of back and forth e-mails then they e-mailed me a pdf of a return label at no cost to me. I sent it back and they sent me another camera in just a few days. This one works perfectly. Way better than the first one ever did. They do honor their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Won't work with my Mac
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this camera everything was fine. I could view my house on my iPhone, my iPad and finally found an App for my Mac desktop. Then all of a sudden the controls would not work on my Mac. No matter the direction I tried to move the camera it would only go to the right. I had to use my phone to return it to it's main position. Repeated attempts at emailing the Yi tech folks only brought many "we are still working on it." I gave up. If this is important, keep this in mind.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Getz

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with useful features.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 7 of these cameras. The build quality is great. Video is nice and crisp. Night vision is good. Both android and apple apps work amazingly well. Motion and sound alerts work right. The viewing angle is wide enough to be able to see the entire room if the camera is installed in the corner if the room. Out of the 7, one camera wouldn't boot up when it had a memory card installed. Factory reset and updates don't fix it. Going to return it but I won't take a star off because the rest work fine and a couple have been up and running 24/7 for months now.
customer_reviews.author: Panagiotis Marmaras

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, can be better
customer_reviews.text: I bought three YI cameras. It's been pretty good to use them. I have some opinion on the app. It can be better to have a group option. So that I can just enter the pin once to unlock the whole group, instead of doing it every time when swithing between cameras. Also a group wise global on/off can be so helpful too. Other than that, it's kind of important to me that I can pass some privileges to the users whom I'm sharing cameras with, such as being able to turn on/off the camera, or receiving alerts. It's still a good product though, very stable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Chen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase 2 of these cameras. 1 worked great for months then suddenly wouldn't load a few times, audio got choppy, camera wouldn't rotate and now its basically useless. Purchased less than a year ago. The 2nd camera, within 2 months, turned to cr*p. Wouldn't connect to the phone app, picture was nothing but multicolored lines, couldn't get audio to work. Definitely will be replacing because these aren't worth buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley M.

customer_reviews.title: Bait & Switch
customer_reviews.text: "Motion Detection, 7-days activity alert video storage in YI cloud free of charge." The app doesn't allow me to subscribe to the "free" cloud storage. Plus, nothing annoys me more than not being able to do what I want to do with MY video. I'm sending this back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Mastersh8k

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, nice app.
customer_reviews.text: As usual with software-driven devices, the sparse directions weren't perfectly matched to the actual activation and registration procedures, but they were close enough that I went from "camera in a box" to watching myself in real time (albeit slightly delayed) on my phone's display. And a day later, I added a second camera in a second house with no problems; it was almost too easy. I found the app fairly straightforward and almost intuitive (one man's "intuitive" is another's "opaque"). Now if I could only figure out how to change the notification sound from the default to something more individual (or they add the capability to the app) I'd be completely happy.
customer_reviews.author: ttterk

customer_reviews.title: Way over priced subscriptions
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought these cameras the subscriptions were within reason, but now its $200/yr for 5 cameras or $19.99/ month for 5 I have 20 of these things!!! Once the old subscriptions expire, these things are going in the trash. Thats similar price as cameras with cellular back up!! The internet goes out these things are useless. If you want a decent camera with way overpriced subscriptions then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Works, but weiiiiiirdddd.
customer_reviews.text: This does what it needs to. It’s fairly easy to set up and use, it goes all the way around so you can see everything, the speaker is pretty decent, and the notification settings are very customizable. But, sometimes when I’m sleeping, I swear I hear it shutter as if it’s taking pictures. I love the device so much, I’m just gonna ignore the sounds and hope to God I’m not featured on some Chinese porn website.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: There was no mention of system requirements prior to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: There was no mention of system requirements prior to purchase. I do not have 5Mkps upload speed with my provider and nowhere was this requirement mentioned. As a result, I now have a fancy paperweight. Will be returning it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marge S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pet Owners/Parents/And people that go away over the weekends
customer_reviews.text: For the price, tis is incredible. You gat a full view, motion detection, notifications to motion detection, recording of said detections, and a two-way audio. My dog is eating my couch. I need something low cost to watch. Through the audio I can detract her from scratching. Not the BEST quality, but for my use and the cost... 100% prefect. Had nighttime light too. While I'm no so sure how safe it is to have a camera linked to wifi, I don't have much to steal or spy over.. so it's ok. I already have 3 co-worked who bought one over mu suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K. Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Something's fishy with this camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Chinese made camera by a Chinese company. I have two cameras installed with this Yi brand. I also have a home server behind Cloudflare CDN. The Cloudflare CDN firewall is set to block all countries including China except the US where I live. I noticed that the firewall logs shows some access attempts from China accessing my home server. Guys be careful with Chinese tech products. They are not secure. Yes it is cheap almost being given away..perhaps there is a reason behind for its low price. They are going for something. Perhaps the ability for the CCP to be able to monitor the whole world and see every street corner and homes all over the world.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Wilson Roial

customer_reviews.title: YI Dome 760p/1080p
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dome because I believe it’s one of the best ones built. The clarity is awesome. However, the night vision isn’t too good. Unless there is a light is the dark area, it will be hard to identify an intruder from a distant. Tech support is getting better but still needs to be more involve and quicker at resolving issues. Although, YI is having some issues, I still recommend this company because I believe they have one of the better products on the market. The 760p dome is good but, I recommend getting the 1080p Dome, it works better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works outside just fine
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered it, I didn't realize it was an indoor model. I have a covered porche and installed it upside down. The phone allows the Image to be rotated upside up, and all is good. used a 10ft usb cable wired through the attic into the suffit and installed an outlet in the attic. For the price, I don't care if the eventually dies due to humidity. Plan to add an extra infrared illuminator to augement the nighttime image.
customer_reviews.author: mycorrado

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, mine quit working after three months. I emailed customer support and they were very responsive until I sent them a video of exactly what it was doing. Then, they stopped replying. I'm assuming they can't help me and instead of just saying that, they stopped replying and won't help me anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! We use it to monitor our 1 year old puppy, she would destroy the house while we were gone. Upon using this we discovered the severity of her separation anxiety, poor pup. This is a huge help and comfort for us, so we can check in on her and talk to her through the camera in case she is howling and crying. It works great, the video and sound quality on the app is really good. The only complaint I could think of is that it can't capture the floor to ceiling view, but we manage to put it on the dining table and get a pretty good shot of the living room. We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EEK

product_meta.title: YI Dome Camera Pan/Tilt/Zoom Wireless IP Indoor Security Surveillance System 720p HD Night Vision, Motion Tracker, Auto-Cruise, Remote Monitor with iOS
product_meta.description: 360° complete coverage smart home system YI Dome camera is your 360° complete coverage smart home system With YI you are in touch with your home wherever you are Rotation bidirectional rotation supports a 345° horizontal rotation range and 115° vertical rotation range With a 112° wide-angle lens YI Dome Cam captures the full scene with practically zero blind spot Automatically returns to “auto-masking” mode for extra sense of security ensuring no recording without your permission Store up to 8 positions as bookmarks and easily return to them at a touch of a button Choose to auto-cruise horizontally 360° or make pit stops at your selected bookmarks Protection YI Dome camera keeps you connected with your family always Check-in with your family through 2-way audio by connecting to live video Take quick snapshots and easily record videos With a 360° viewing angle every spot is covered Enhanced night vision stays awake while you sleep with 8 built-in 940nm (non-invasive) infrared LEDs YI Dome Cam night vision can shoot in the dark for a range up to 3 meters YI home App monitor your home with YI home App View YI Dome camera along with your other YI home camera family in one integrated app Our motion detection algorithm is YI Dome CAM's safety hallmark Movements can be accurately picked up and activity alerts are immediately sent to the app 10 seconds smart motion tracking keeps up with everything so you don’t have to Ease of use Quick and versatile installation Place YI where it suits you best vertical wall mount or Ceiling Simple and Flexible storage options local and Cloud (to be available soon) --package include-- 1 x YI Dome camera 1 x adaptor 1 x USB Cable 1 x base tray 2 x screw 1 x Manual
feature_bullets: 720p High-definition, 112° wide-angle advanced glass lens combined with 345° horizontal & 115° vertical rotation range create a complete 360° coverage. Advanced night vision with 8 built-in 940nm infrared LED beads extend the viewing distance to 3 meters in pitch dark with no light pollution, so your baby or pet will not be disturbed by LED glare.

Responsive and advanced microphone with a built-in anti-noise filter for a clear 2-way Audio experience. Intercom Mode: one party to talk and listen at a time or Hands-free Mode: both parties talk and listen freely for maximum flexibility.

Receive real-time Activity Alerts while you're out. 10-sec motion tracking records and centers the moving object. Bookmark your favorite positions (up to 8) and return to them at the tap of a button. Select Auto-Cruise to survey the area 360° horizontally or cruise your bookmarks, suitable for large areas that need a quick scan (and tracks moving objects).

YI Dome integrates with your YI Home family in one simple interface. User-friendly and intuitive app to customize your settings: activity alerts, auto-cruise, bookmarks, camera sharing, customize schedules, and more. Supports connectivity to a large number of devices with the same app/account for maximum convenience. Available for iOS and Android.

Supports YI Cloud to avoid the risk of losing footage from an SD card, ensure all your videos are safe, secure and protected. We provide the most efficient compression and the highest protection of data, so you can be sure that your footage is safe and secure. Reliable Wi-Fi connectivity to access your camera with YI Home App on mobile device, and YI Home App on PC at anytime, anywhere. Built-in support for 802.11b/g/n 2.4Ghz (5Ghz currently not supported) Wi-Fi band.
Note: the firmware version must match your camera version. You can flash a Chinese version camera with any other version of firmware and power-on it, but it can never be paired.
